title: Waverley Novels. (Abbotsford edition.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " Was it notthe last season, as they ca't, no farther gane, thatyoung Sir Bingo Binks, the English lad wi' the redcoat, that keeps a mail-coach, and drives it himsell, gat cleekit with Miss Rachel Bonnyrigg, theauld Leddy Loupengirth's lang-legged daughter and they danced sae lang thegither, that there wasmair said than suld hae been said about it andthe lad would fain have louped back, but the auldleddy held him to his tackle, and the CommissaryCourt and somebody else made her Leddy Binksin spite of Sir Bingo's heart — and he has neverdaured take her to his friends in England, but they

title: Over the Ocean; or, Sights and Scenes in Foreign Lands
author: Guild, Curtis.
snippet: " Hallo, Binks ! — is that you ? How are you ? Why, wesaw your name on the register atop of Mount Righi sixmonths ago.
